name: titan
description: 自己変革の火をつけるWebサービス

scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd reactjs && yarn install && cd ../ && cd firebase/functions && yarn install
scripts.deploy:all: npm run verify && npm run deploy --prefix reactjs && npm run deploy --prefix firebase/functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix reactjs && npm run lint --prefix firebase/functions
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix reactjs && npm run lint:fix --prefix firebase/functions
scripts.tsc: cd reactjs && yarn tsc && cd ../ &&  cd firebase/functions && yarn tsc
scripts.sync: git pull && git fetch -p && npm run install:all
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run tsc
